position: Programmeur(-euse) backend sénior (Unreal) / Senior Backend Programmer (Unreal)
name: People Can Fly
description: People Can Fly is an independent AAA games development studio composed of international professionals, known for titles like Painkiller, Bulletstorm, and Gears of War: Judgment, and currently developing multiple projects including Gemini with Square Enix and Maverick in collaboration with Microsoft Corporation.
